title: The generall demands, of the reverend doctors of divinitie, and ministers of the Gospell in Aberdene, concerning the late covenant, in Scotland together, with the answeres, replyes, and duplyes that followed thereupon, in the year, 1638 : reprinted in one book, by order of Parliament.
author: Forbes, John, 1593-1648.
notes: Added title page: Generall demands concerning the late covenant : propounded by the ministers and professors of divinity in Aberdene ... Aberdene : Reprinted by John Forbes, 1662.
Each of the answers and replies has a special t.p.

The "Demands" and "Replies" are by John Forbes, Alexander Scrogie, William Lesley, Robert Baron, James Sibbard, and Alexander Ross; the "Answers" are by Alexander Henderson, David Dickson, and Andrew Cant.
Imperfect: copy at 655:2 lacks cover t.p. (Wing C4226).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
